      • doesHostContainsFolder

        boolean doesHostContainsFolder(Host parent,
                             java.lang.String folderName)
                               throws DotDataException,
                                      DotSecurityException
        Checks if a host contains a folder has its direct child
        Parameters:
        parent - Parent host
        folderName - Name of the folder child of the host
        Returns:
        true if the folder is child of the parent host, false otherwise
        Throws:
        DotDataException
        DotSecurityException
        DotSecurityException

      • resolveHostName

        Host resolveHostName(java.lang.String serverName,
                   com.liferay.portal.model.User user,
                   boolean respectFrontendRoles)
                     throws DotDataException,
                            DotSecurityException
        This method takes a server name (from a web request) and maps it to a host. It is designed to do a lightweight cache lookup to get the mapping from server name -> host and to prevent unnecessary lucene lookups
        Parameters:
        serverName -
        user -
        respectFrontendRoles -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DotDataException
        DotSecurityException
